title: C S Vigneshwar appointed FADA President
description: The Federation of Automobile Dealers Associations (FADA) has appointed C S Vigneshwar as its President for the 2024-26 period. Vigneshwar, Managing Director of Anaamalais Toyota, has been a council member for 12 years. Other key appointments include Sai Giridhar as Vice President and Amar Jatin Sheth as Secretary.
